seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 8+ years of experience, which aligns with senior level in data engineering hierarchy.

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and core responsibilities include SQL, Python, and data pipeline creation — all hallmarks of a data engineering role.

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions 'Data pipeline creation' and 'Snowflake Database' — both typically associated with batch ETL workflows in data warehousing contexts. No streaming or real-time tools mentioned.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management responsibilities. Role appears focused on individual technical execution.

primary_cloud.evidence: Snowflake is mentioned, but it is a cloud-agnostic data warehouse. No specific cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP) is referenced in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers are mentioned at all, so no secondary clouds can be inferred.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Emphasis on SQL, Snowflake, and data pipeline creation suggests batch processing workflows. No streaming tools (Kafka, Flink, Kinesis) or real-time terminology mentioned.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, dbt, Dagster, etc.) are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake is explicitly mentioned, which is a cloud data warehouse. No lake or lakehouse technologies (Delta Lake, Iceberg, Hudi) referenced.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as 'Cupertino, CA' and work model is 'onsite' — indicating requirement to be physically present in the Bay Area region.

timezone_focus.evidence: Geo restriction is 'US only' with state restriction to 'CA' — indicating focus on US, specifically California.

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Cupertino, CA implies candidate must relocate to that location if not already there.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is explicitly 'not_mentioned' in Pass 1, and no indication of sponsorship availability — typical for consulting firms like TCS unless stated.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas or OPT/CPT eligibility. Requirement for 8+ years experience implies work authorization is expected, not student status.

citizenship_required.evidence: Geo restriction is 'US only' and work model is onsite — implies candidate must be authorized to work in the US, but no citizenship or green card requirement stated.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is 'full_time' and 'permanent' — consistent with W2 employee status, not contract or 1099.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction — no health insurance, PTO, equity, or learning budget referenced.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career progression, promotion paths, or growth opportunities in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, senior collaboration, or learning support in the job description or Pass 1 data.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career ladder in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are mentioned or implied in the job posting or Pass 1 data.

requirement_strictness.evidence: All listed skills (SQL, Python, Snowflake, Data pipeline creation) are marked as 'must have' with no 'nice to have' items — indicating strict requirements.

scope_definition.evidence: Role is narrowly defined as 'Senior Data Engineer' with specific technical requirements (SQL, Python, Snowflake) — no hybrid or multi-role responsibilities mentioned.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8+ years experience for a 'Senior' role is reasonable and aligned with industry norms. Skills required are standard for senior data engineers.
